description: One of a number of urban trails in the district of Saanich. This one follows the Colquitz river and such has a mixture of urban areas as well as area that given the impression of being further than you are from civilization.It's flat so it's an easy walk or ride
directions: Can be accessed at a number of points. Using BC transit it's easy to make it a one way walk.One starting point can be found behind Montana's in the Tillicum Centre parking lot.
title: Colquitz River trail
